scripts.build: concurrently "yarn workspace software-eng regBuild" "yarn workspace interests regBuild" && yarn workspace host build
scripts.preview: concurrently "yarn build-se" "yarn serve-se" "yarn build-i" "yarn serve-i" "yarn workspace host dev" --names "software-eng,software-eng,interests,interests,host" --prefix "[{name}]" --prefix-colors blue,blue,green,green,yellow
